website_summaries.verdict: Some of the silhouettes that New Balance produced have made such a historical imprint. The NB 547 is one classic example. The golf-version carries out this legacy and brings it on the links. Golfers are quick to notice the qualities of this item, including comfort, versatility, and craftsmanship. Overall, the majority of those who purchased the shoe gave their full recommendation.
pros: A high percentage of testers are fans of how the New Balance 574 Greens is styled
It is unique looking and has the vibe of a casual shoe
Several reviewers declare that it is comfortable to wear and walk in
Numerous purchasers are pleased that this product is offered at an affordable price
Some commenters are happy that it can be used from the office to playing a round of golf without changing footwear
A few individuals praise this New Balance golf shoe for its multi-functionality
They are using it even when playing tennis or when going to the mall
The spikeless design delivers stability without compromising green-friendliness, says one customer
A golfer notices that the materials and cushions used are made of high-quality materials
cons: One complains that the toe box has a narrow fit
The trainer is heavier than the typical New Balance golf shoes, according to a player

customer_reviews.title: Make sure get 4E if you have wide foot like me 😅
customer_reviews.text: Fit just nice even it’s 4e which is extra wide, but I think can’t go with thick socks. And if we are playing golf and need to walk a lot I personally finds thick compression sock is important for my game 😃. But this still a great pair of shoes for golf👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: deskoo

customer_reviews.title: Extra wide
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14 foot. Bought the 14 wide and extra wide. Depending on the shoe and the material, I can go from normal to wide widths. In this case I went with the xtra wide because it just felt better. If it ends up stretching much I might be outta luck but the material looks as if it will not too much. I read where one reviewer said to buy wider than you usually need to. In my case this is true. Don’t usually where extra wide but it was the best fit this time. Probably one of the most comfortable shoes I’ve owned. Literally like walking on pillows. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable but Now They Leak!
customer_reviews.text: Had these since May and love the fit and feel, but played in wet grass yesterday and one shoe started leaking. Ad says waterproof warranty for two years, but the process to get a new pair looks nearly impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Cushman Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but only waterproof if playing in dry condition.
customer_reviews.text: I like how comfortable these shoes are, but their waterproof claim turned out to not be true. I exclusively golf early in the morning when there is dew on the ground. By the end of the round the shoes are soaked and my socks are wet. If you play later in the day or in dry condition these are great shoes. They did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: movie fan

customer_reviews.title: Narrow but great if you order wider than normal
customer_reviews.text: So far so good on these. They are very comfortable. However I think they are a tad narrow. I wear New Balance 992’s as my everyday shoe in a size 8 D. So I ordered these in 8 D, thinking the NB sizes were universal across models. That was not the case - the 8 D in these were snug in terms of width across the toe box. I exchanged these (which was easy due to Amazon Prime) for the 8 2E size and now they fit much better. Traction is good. Laces stay tied. Comfort after going up one notch in width is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Squash Fan

customer_reviews.title: Order bigger thsan needed
customer_reviews.text: received, so small could not get them on, ordered bigger and wider fitts good now, however archs hurt. had to order orthodics cost more than the shoe
customer_reviews.author: thosewhoplay

customer_reviews.title: My feet don't hurt when I have finished playing 18.
customer_reviews.text: Never realized how bad my golf shoes were until I bought these new shoes!!! My game has improved and my feet don't hurt at the end of playing 18. Not for everyone but I really like these golf shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Golf Bob

customer_reviews.title: New Balance golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just a little tight but made well and after one round of golf they seemed to be a good fit. Liked New Balance athletic shoes so I gave these a try. Not disappointed but wished these were a bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Cattafesta

customer_reviews.title: New Balance.. Comfortable as usual
customer_reviews.text: I always buy New Balance athletic shoes (running, walking or golf) because I know my size will fit perfectly. No surprises. Quality is always the highest.
customer_reviews.author: JoeB

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore these for the first time and walked 18 holes. They were comfortable and had good support. These are the best golf shoes he has owned.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Product sucks!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this shoe I them in February did not get a chance to use them due to Corona 19 because all courses were closed and after 4 rounds of golf they are opening up at the seams!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grayling L Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fit well
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and fit well. Wish I could find this style in a regular shoe. Like the casual style for golfing as well
customer_reviews.author: Victor B.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks good,doesnt fit at all its too long,not wide as sold, hurts my feet,eats my socks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer deloris

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and effective during first use. My feet are prone to slipping when I swing, and I didnt slip the whole round.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could wear these all the time. In fact, there are days I’ve seriously thought about it. I will definitely be buying these again next time, maybe in black.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Swing stability
customer_reviews.text: It fits well with your feet and provides stability when swinging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These Shoes are Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The cushioning on the back of the show wears out way to quickly and the shoe subsequently causes blisters. Of course the return window closed 2 wks ago so now I am SOL. FYI, I only had these for 2 + months - hopefully the seller will read this and send me a new pair. I will update the review if this does happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoe I’ve ever worn. Been playing for about 25yrs.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Glad i bought them
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this shoe. Wish the sole was a tad wider but very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Fagerli

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for my golf shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I need a high instep. I've had NB before. I sized up from any 8.5 to a 9. Extra wide. Fits just like my old NB shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald H. Schiff

customer_reviews.title: size marked is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: size marked is not accurate I wear an 8.5 D and ordered a wide marked 2E it was too narrow so I returned them
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of golf shoes I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Just took them out for my first round and these things are more comfortable than my every day sneakers! I'd consider buying a pair just for that! They grip the ground solidly with no slipping. A+ design.
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: They’re very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable much better than my other pair of golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit great, are waterproof, and they look really nice too. The shoes fit as expected based on other New Balance shoes that I own.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling good looking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very comfortable. Nice looking and kept my feet dry in wet grass.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Power of shoes understood!~
customer_reviews.text: Go one or two size larger. I tortured myself for 4 hours walking on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Absolute beginner

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 4e when i wear a two e. Was still to narrow
customer_reviews.author: Doug Pfaltzgraff

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality from New Balance
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly poor construction for a NB product. Stitching coming out in multiple places after walking 2 rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Pugh

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable on golf course, but could be a bit wider.
customer_reviews.author: James S Vambreck

customer_reviews.title: true to size, and pics
customer_reviews.text: look great, true to size, first round in them tommorow
customer_reviews.author: Jen Albright-Burns

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Men's 574 Greens Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: these were a little narrow so replaced the order with the 4E and while these fit for the width, the shoes are stiff and not as comfortable as I thought they would be. Maybe after using them a few times they will be better. The shoes do offer great grip for a spikeless golf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Pops_Silva_Fox

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I walked around 15 golf rounds i this pair, and the sole has come loose on one of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great for golf and everyday
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product from a local golf shop that will be closing because of the results of the CV=19 lock down. Great price! I was looking at another shoe when I found this. The insole is deeply cushioned and feels like it wraps around my foot. The nubbies on the bottom are good enough for golf but also small enough I have been wearing them for everyday wear. The advantage of the golf style over the other 574's is they are guaranteed waterproof for two years. I will be ordering more in the future just in case NB decides to discontinue like most shoe mfg. do.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.

customer_reviews.title: Overall fit of shoe
customer_reviews.text: Have been a Foot Joy shoe buyer for 30+ years. Need a 10 XW. Not offered by all sellers. Wanted to try something new so I opted for the New Balance. Have used for 3 rounds....ok. I always keep two pairs on hand so I ordered a pair of FJ’s yesterday. Will let you know.
customer_reviews.author: steve young

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes but too long for me and not available in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Garea51

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes weighed about 75% more than my NB Minimus shoes I'd had for 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: bs2k45

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 574 Greens Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: Inspired by our classic New Balance Court Classics, the Men’s 574 Greens combines New Balance comfort, durability and style with golf-specific technologies designed to enhance traction, stability, and ultimately, your game.
feature_bullets: Extra-thick PU sockliner for increased comfort
